resources.string: A celebration is an occurrence which is a fusion of happiness, traditions, colors, devotion, and respect for our culture. While talking about celebrations we certainly can’t forget the most happening yet anticipated festival of our very own state Gujarat which is NAVRATRI. We had always believed in celebrating the brightest of emotions of every individual, so now when the CHARUSAT family are concerned how can we forget to celebrate theirs.
Once again this year CHARUSAT Central Council brings back the grooves and perception of happiness to the university with the high end celebration of our most awaited event of the year.
Vrund 17 is going to be a more memorable day in your life so why you are waiting for lock your dates on the calendar with 6 October and enjoy the celebration with joy…

Be a part of Vrund and make it memorable for your life. You’ll find various kinds of garba steps during the celebration played by your friends. Traditional dressing is required for playing the garba as participant.
Central Council heartily invites you to the annual garba festival of CHARUSAT. Don’t forget to register yourself for your presence. College ID Card is mandatory for the entry.
Having dinner together as a family will be our pleasure. Don’t forget to carry your college ID card during the refreshment.
Prizes and Awards will be awarded to best performance and best dressing participant. But before that don’t forget to register yourself.
